snippet: FixYa, the volunteer technical-assistance Web site, combed through more than 23,000 support requests for the most popular streaming-TV sets (Apple TV, GoogleTV, Boxee and Roku) and gleaned some recommendations.
abstract: FixYa, the volunteer technical-assistance Web site, combed through more than 23,000 support requests for the most popular streaming-TV sets (Apple TV, GoogleTV, Boxee and Roku) and gleaned some recommendations.

headline.print_headline: Which Web TV Box Performs Best? Ask the Owners
